verses.name: Exodus 34:23
verses.text: Thrice in the year shall all your men children appear before the Lord God, the God of Israel.

verses.name: Exodus 34:24
verses.text: For I will cast out the nations before thee, and enlarge thy borders: neither shall any man desire thy land, when thou shalt go up to appear before the Lord thy God thrice in the year.

verses.name: Exodus 34:25
verses.text: Thou shalt not offer the blood of my sacrifice with leaven; neither shall the sacrifice of the feast of the passover be left unto the morning.
